description: A modern restaurant with an elegant, contemporary decor situated on the main pedestrian street in the town centre. The menu features an excellent selection of raw dishes, as well as a good choice of oysters and caviar, plus an excellent buffet of more elaborate contemporary-style fresh fish options. Sparkling wines are to the fore on the wine list.
